data_table.description: Medication Survey Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: MSRD1
variable.description: [Reception]. Did you bring all the medications you used in the past two weeks, or their containers? Q1 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD2
variable.description: [Reception]. Is this because you forgot, because you have not taken any medications at all in the last two weeks, or because you could not bring your medications? Q2 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]
variable.value: Forgot or was unable to bring medications

variable.name: MSRD3
variable.description: [Reception]. Could we follow up on this after the visit so that we can get the information from the (other) medication labels? Q3 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD4A
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication A name. Q4a [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD4B
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication A concentration. Q4b [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD4C
variable.description: [Medication records]. Medication A code number. Q4c [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD4D
variable.description: [Medication records]. Did you take this medication in the past 24 hours? Q4d [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24A
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: high blood pressure. Q24a [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24B
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: high blood cholesterol. Q24b [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24C
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: angina or chest pain. Q24c [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24D
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: control of heart rhythm. Q24d [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24E
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: heart failure. Q24e [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24F
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: blood thinning. Q24f [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24G
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: diabetes or high blood sugar. Q24g [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24H
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: stroke. Q24h [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD24I
variable.description: [Interview]. Were any of the medications you took during the past two weeks for: leg pain when walking. Q24i [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD25
variable.description: [Interview]. During the past two weeks, did you take any aspirin, Alka-Seltzer, cold medicine or headache powder? Q25 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD27
variable.description: [Interview]. For what purpose are you taking aspirin? Q27 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]
variable.value: Participant mentioned avoiding heart attack or stroke
Participant did not mention avoiding heart attack or stroke

variable.name: MSRD28
variable.description: [Interview]. During the past two weeks, did you take any [other] medication for arthritis, fever, or muscle aches and pains, (or menstrual cramps)? Q28 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD29
variable.description: [Interview]. Are you NOW taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? This does not include Tylenol nor Advil. Q29 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD29A
variable.description: [Interview]. What is the strength of aspirin in the pill? Q29a [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD29D
variable.description: [Interview]. For what purpose are you taking this medication? Q29d [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]
variable.value: Participant mentioned to avoid heart attack or stroke
Participant did not mention to avoid heart attack or stroke

variable.name: MSRD30
variable.description: [Interview]. Except for aspirin or Tylenol, are you NOW taking other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs or arthritis medicines on a regular basis? Examples include Ibuprofen, Advil, Nuprin, Motrin, Naprosyn, Feldene and Clinoril. Q30 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD30A
variable.description: [Interview]. Except for aspirin or Tylenol, are you NOW taking other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs or arthritis medicines on a regular basis? Examples include Ibuprofen, Advil, Nuprin, Motrin, Naprosyn, Feldene and Clinoril. What is the brand name of the medicine? [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD30B
variable.description: [Interview]. Except for aspirin or Tylenol, are you NOW taking other non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs or arthritis medicines on a regular basis? Examples include Ibuprofen, Advil, Nuprin, Motrin, Naprosyn, Feldene and Clinoril. What is the brand name of the medicine? If "Other", specify? Q30b [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD21
variable.description: [Medication records]. Total number of medications in bag. Q21 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD22
variable.description: [Medication records]. Number of medications unable to transcribe. Q22 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD26
variable.description: [Interview]. How many days during the last two weeks did you take aspirin, or a medication that contains aspirin? Q26 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD29B
variable.description: [Interview]. How many days a week, on average, are you taking this medication? Q29b [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD29C
variable.description: [Interview]. How many pills are you taking per week, on average? Q29c [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD30C
variable.description: [Interview]. How many pills per week are you taking, on average? Q30c [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRDFLAG
variable.description: Indicator for presence of form [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRDCY
variable.description: Contact year [10] [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD29EMONTHS
variable.description: Months of started taking aspirin since exam 1 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]

variable.name: MSRD30DMONTHS
variable.description: Months of started taking nasaid since exam 1 [Medication Survey Form, exam 4]
